sentences.en: Co - ordinate work schedule and supervise team activities to ensure efficient operation.
sentences.cn: 协调工作进度及督促班组工作以确保有效运作.
格里菲思密切指导该项研究。

sentences.en: He had left her at the car to supervise the baggage.
sentences.cn: 他让她留在汽车里看管行李.

sentences.en: May supervise other auditors or professionals charge of accounting within client's establishment.
sentences.cn: 可能领导其他审计师及专业人员负责客户机构内的会计.

sentences.en: People from the Equipment management center is responsible for training and supervise.
sentences.cn: 各分厂设备管理员负责培训和督导工人操作.

sentences.en: Provide technical guidance to maintenance people supervise maintenance quality.
sentences.cn: 为维修人员提供技术指导,控制维修质量.

sentences.en: Responsible for bidding for small project, supervise the service quality of contractors.
sentences.cn: 负责小项目的招标工作, 以及现场监理,保证工程达到公司要求的标准.

sentences.en: Supervise cleaners and housekeeping contractor to maintain office and public place housekeeping.
sentences.cn: 管理清洁工,保持办公区域和公共区域的卫生整洁.

sentences.en: Supervise control division expense, strengthen the staves'cost consciousness.
sentences.cn: 管理控制部门费用, 增强员工成本意识.

sentences.en: Supervise crowd control at the main entrance and VIP rooms'entrance.
sentences.cn: 在主要入口和VIP入口实施人群控制.

sentences.en: Supervise operations of the ERP system and come up with improvement solution.
sentences.cn: 管理ERP系统的运行,并不断提出改进方案.

sentences.en: The duty administrative assistant will supervise junior student visits to the toilets.
sentences.cn: 校务助理协助老师课间陪同学生去洗手间.

sentences.en: Tomorrow he will supervise all the pupils taking the English examination.
sentences.cn: 明天全体学生考英语,他将担任监考.

sentences.en: University teachers have refused to supervise students' examinations.
We must supervise and speed up the fulfilment of assigned tasks.
sentences.cn: 已经布置了的工作,应当认真督促检查.

words.tran_cn: 监督人，[管理] 管理人；检查员
监督（supervise的过去式和过去分词）；指导

trans.tran_en: to be in charge of an activity or person, and make sure that things are done in the correct way

trans.tran_cn: 监督， 管理； 指导
